explains: n. 军备，武器；武装，战备

sentences.en: The weaponry and armament should be comparable in advantage of different areas.
sentences.cn: 军备和武器的各自优势应该在不同的领域进行比较。

sentences.en: I was shocked to discover that it was an Arsenal containing an array of antiquated armor and armament.
sentences.cn: 我愕然发现这竟是个军械库，里面存放着全系列的古老盔甲和武器。
